desc.en: Sensei runs into Hibiki, who is choosing fabrics at the market. Hibiki says that she's selecting fabrics to put together a cosplay, and begins talking about her cosplaying hobby in great detail.

profile.en:
A member of the Engineering Department who puts on a cheerleader outfit for game days.

Hibiki's sewing skills are sharp thanks to her love of cosplay, so she designs and makes special event outfits for all the members of the Engineering Department. She made this particular cheerleader outfit a long time ago, so it seems to be a bit small in some places.
profile.jp:
ミレニアムサイエンススクール所属、大運動会を迎え、チアリーダーの衣装に身を包んだエンジニア部の部員。

普段のコスプレ趣味で培った裁縫スキルを生かし、エンジニア部員が着る衣装を製作した。なお、チアリーダーの衣装は昔作ったものをリメイクしたからか、スカート丈が少し気になっている様子。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
千年科学学园所属，迎接大运动会而换上了应援团服的「工程部」成员。

发挥由平时Cosplay兴趣培养而出的缝纫技能做出了工程部成员穿着的服装。
以及，也许由于应援团服是把以前做的那套重制的缘故，似乎很在意裙子的长度。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
千年科学学园所属，为了迎接大运动会而打扮成啦啦队的工程师部成员。

发挥平常因Cosplay的兴趣而培养出的裁缝技能，制作了给工程师部成员们穿的服装。但可能因为啦啦队服是拿以前做好的服装进行改良，所以对裙子的长度有些在意。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
千年科学学园所属，迎接大运动会而换上了应援团服的「工程部」成员。

发挥由平时Cosplay兴趣培养而出的缝纫技能做出了工程部成员穿着的服装。
以及，也许由于应援团服是把以前做的那套重制的缘故，似乎很在意裙子的长度。

intro.en: Sensei... Um, uh, wh-what do you think? This is my first time making a cheerleader outfit... It's not too bad, right?
intro.jp:
先生…ど、どう…？
チアリーダーの衣装を作ったのは、
初めてだけど…そんなに悪くは…ない？
intro.zh_cn_jp:
先生…ど、どう…？
チアリーダーの衣装を作ったのは、
初めてだけど…そんなに悪くは…ない？
intro.zh_cn_tw:
老师…如，如何…？
我第一次做的啦啦队服…
…应该还不错吧？

desc.en: Noa and Sensei return to the industrial lab to take a look at the newly built cheer bot. But when they arrive, they are greeted by the members of the Engineering Department wearing cheerleading uniforms instead. They confess that they had finished the cheer bot, but it went haywire and fled the scene when they tried running tests. However, Noa reviews the robot's blueprints and determines it must have been hacked.
desc.jp: Noa and Sensei return to the industrial lab to take a look at the newly built cheer bot. But when they arrive, they are greeted by the members of the Engineering Department wearing cheerleading uniforms instead. They confess that they had finished the cheer bot, but it went haywire and fled the scene when they tried running tests. However, Noa reviews the robot's blueprints and determines it must have been hacked.
desc.zh_cn: {cf乃爱}和老师回到工业实习室查看新制作的应援机器人。但在那里等他们的却是一身应援团打扮的{cn工程师部}。原来，虽然成功做出了应援机器人，但它却突然失控逃走了。{cf乃爱}看了应援机器人的蓝图，怀疑是被人入侵了。

desc.en: With the help of Veritas, Sensei and the students succeed in finding the Millennium students who stole the cheer bot. The students in question are a group who oppose the Kivotos Halo Festival due to their extreme dislike of physical activity called the Anti-Halo Festival Group. Backed into a corner, the rebellious students attack the group with the monstrous cheer bot.
desc.jp: With the help of Veritas, Sensei and the students succeed in finding the Millennium students who stole the cheer bot. The students in question are a group who oppose the Kivotos Halo Festival due to their extreme dislike of physical activity called the Anti-Halo Festival Group. Backed into a corner, the rebellious students attack the group with the monstrous cheer bot.
desc.zh_cn: {cn研讨会}一行人在{cn贝里塔斯}的帮助下，成功找出偷走应援机器人的{sn千年}学园学生。他们是一群讨厌体育活动，反对举办晄轮大祭的学生。为了阻止大运动会，他们这段时间一直在进行各种阻碍行动。这群「晄．反．会」的学生，利用从{cn工程师部}偷来的机器人对付{cn研讨会}一行人。

desc.en: The powerful combat capabilities of the Track Crasher bring the Engineering Department and Veritas to their knees. When all hope seems lost, Noa comes up with a way to stop it in its tracks. The Anti-Halo Festival Group students in hiding are eventually caught by Sumire, finally bringing the incident to an end.
desc.jp: The powerful combat capabilities of the Track Crasher bring the Engineering Department and Veritas to their knees. When all hope seems lost, Noa comes up with a way to stop it in its tracks. The Anti-Halo Festival Group students in hiding are eventually caught by Sumire, finally bringing the incident to an end.
desc.zh_cn: 在「赛道破坏者」的强大战斗力面前，{cn工程师部}和{cn贝里塔斯}屡屡受挫。多亏{cf乃爱}想出来的点子，赛道破坏者才失去战斗能力，使战况得以反转。躲藏的「晄．反．会」学生也被{cf堇}一网打尽，骚动就此结束。

desc.en: Sensei asks the students of the Anti-Halo Festival Group why they wanted to disrupt the festival so badly and listens to their grievances. Noa and Sensei make some revisions to ensure everyone can enjoy the field day in their own way. Afterwards, all of the Millennium students come together as one to prepare for the competition.

desc.zh_cn: 老师问「晄．反．会」的学生妨碍大运动会的原因，听他们诉说苦衷。后来{cf乃爱}和老师为了营造能让大家开心的大运动会，决定修改部分计划。之后{sn千年}学园的学生便同心协力努力准备大运动会。

desc.en: Yuuka wakes up from her herbal tea-induced slumber in a panic. She tracks down Noa, and soon realizes that her fellow students had worked tirelessly through the night to complete the Halo Festival preparations so she could rest. She thanks Sensei and Noa, and the Kivotos Halo Festival begins!

She tracks down Noa, and soon realizes that her fellow students had worked tirelessly through the night to complete the Halo Festival preparations so she could rest. She thanks Sensei and Noa, and the Kivotos Halo Festival begins!
desc.zh_cn: 从睡梦中惊醒的{cf优香}慌忙赶到现场，这才发现其他{sn千年}学园的学生在自己熟睡的时候，帮忙准备大运动会。{cf优香}向帮助自己的{cf乃爱}和老师道谢……「晄轮大祭」顺利开幕。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。
